What we can also read from this table is that if the:

  • price increases and the quantity increases, then the cause is

  • price decreases and the quantity decreases, then the cause is

  • price decreases and the quantity increases, then the cause is

  • price increases and the quantity decreases, then the cause is

  • price increases and the quantity increases, then the cause is an increase in demand.
  • price decreases and the quantity decreases, then the cause is a decrease in demand.
  • price decreases and the quantity increases, then the cause is an increase in supply.
  • price increases and the quantity decreases, then the cause is a decrease in supply.
